All Implemented Interfaces:
FeatureRanking, FeatureSelection
public class RankingFromScoring
extends java.lang.Object
implements FeatureRanking

Creates an attribute ranking from an attribute evaluation technique.

Build the attribute evaluation on the supplied data set. Note: This method can change the data set that is supplied to the method!

rank

public int rank(int attIndex)
Description copied from interface: FeatureRanking
Get the ranking of the given attribute. The first rank is 0 and is the best. The higher the rank, the worse the attribute.

Specified by:
rank in interface FeatureRanking
Parameters:
attIndex - the index of the attribute to rank
Returns:
the rank of the attribute
